title: Emerald and Diamond Haaramaala - A Timeless Telugu Treasure
materials: Ruby Accent Stone. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This Haaramaala features a cascading design with rows of shimmering diamonds. Emerald accents are strategically placed throughout the necklace and drop pendants, leading down to a larger, emerald-centered pendant. The main pendant showcases a detailed filigree design, surrounded by more diamonds and finished with delicate gold dangles. The necklace is designed to sit gracefully on the collarbone, offering a blend of modern sophistication and traditional Telugu elegance.
occasions: and formal events. Also perfect for traditional ceremonies like Seemantham and upscale social gatherings. This is a statement piece designed to impress at any special occasion.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship using high-quality materials ensures lasting beauty and durability. The Haaramaala's design seamlessly blends traditional South Indian aesthetics with a modern flair, making it a versatile piece. The natural emeralds and brilliant-cut diamonds provide exceptional sparkle and elevate the overall value. A true heirloom piece to be cherished for generations. Possesses the traditional cultural significance of the Haaramaala while maintaining a light and contemporary feel.
